remarks.format:
## 解説
## 例 次の例は、追加する方法を示しています。 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource> 派生する型、 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>です。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Commit() cil managed

Docs.summary: すべての変更をコミットして、ドキュメント パッケージにリソースをフラッシュします。

remarks.format:
## 解説 Based on settings of <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, the flush operation of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> method may be delayed until the whole <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> is closed.
## 例 The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> method \(in a derived class\) when you add resources to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate\#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate\#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate\#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]
